comment_text: 0:55 Wait... Did he just say his name is Rusty ShwankHard? xD 8D xD
If you send out a super sensitive infrared telescope were gonna be seeing more than just asteroids
If you could determine the composition of these asteroids with a spectrometer of sorts, i could see the potential. Asteroid mining is going to be a huge industry.

the probability of all of these millions of asteroids to actually hit earth in some point is little, to non-existent. those who manage to get out of orbit and enter earth's atmosphere are either burned down to powder or land in the ocean (or other uncivilized places) in about 0.0009% of the time they actually manage to cause some destruction, like what we have seen in russia.
